column5: there was a fire at Green Go Garden restaurant in Siem Reap city. The fire was put out within 30 minutes.------The owner
column7: had leased the business to Norbert Vella
column9: from Italy.------There was damage to computers
column10: dining and restaurant equipment.------The fire is reported to have been caused by an electrical short circuit.------A fire truck was not used because of the cooperation of citizens who had already extinguished the flames.------ POST NEWS
